com.readytalk.swt.text.tokenizer

Interface TextTokenizer


  • public interface TextTokenizer
    TextTokenizer is an interface to be implemented by text tokenizers wanting to be constructed by the TextTokenizerFactory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.nio.charset.Charset getEncoding()
      Get the character encoding of the text tokenizer.
      TextTokenizer reset()
      Reset the tokenizer to its deafult state.
      TextTokenizer setEncoding(java.nio.charset.Charset encoding)
      Set the character encoding for the text tokenizer.
      java.util.List<TextToken> tokenize(java.lang.String text)
      Tokenize the given text and return a reference to the internal token list.
